title: Ground Rules Home Page UX/UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to https://www.mlb.com/groundrules
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* MLB Header
* Full Ground Rules background skin
* American and National Leagues that are divided in East, Central, and West 
* Team logo, team name, and club's ballpark name
* Universal Ground Rules
* MLB Footer

THEN the page will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

title: Team-Specific UX/UI Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to https://www.mlb.com/groundrules
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps/selects a team to view
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* MLB Header
* Ballpark Name (Team Name) on the header
* Panorama picture of the park with pins in it
* Mini map 
* Selected ballpark's Ground Rules Particulars
* Universal Ground Rules
* MLB Footer

THEN the page will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

title: Highlighting a Balloon
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to a team-specific page
custom_steps: WHEN the user hovers on a balloon on either in the panorama image, minimap, or the Ground Rule Particulars
custom_expected: THEN the balloons associated with this balloon in all panorama image, mini map, and Ground Rule Particulars will be highlighted as well

title: Modal Popup
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to a team-specific page
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects on a balloon on either in the panorama image, minimap, or the Ground Rule Particulars
custom_expected:
THEN the popup associated with this balloon will show up

THEN the popup will show the number of its contents in the upper-right hand corner of the modal 

THEN the popup will display the selected media larger and the thumbnails of the not selected media content(s) below it

THEN the popup will display dots below the selected media that represents the number of media content(s) in this modal

title: Modal Popup Media Content
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the modal popup showed up
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a thumbnail below
custom_expected: THEN the modal will display the newly selected media content larger in the modal

title: Video Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the selected media content in the modal is a video
custom_expected:
THEN the modal will display a video player with the following:

* Pause/Play button
* Hoverable time duration 
* Sound icon
* Full-screen icon
* Settings icon
* Download (under Settings)
* Picture in picture (under Settings)

THEN these buttons will be functional and will work as the name suggests

title: Closing the Modal
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a modal is opened
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on 'X' button on the upper-right hand side of the modal or clicks on an area behind the modal
custom_expected:
THEN the modal will be closed

THEN the page will revert back to its view before the modal was opened

title: Panorama UX/UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to a team-specific page
custom_steps: WHEN the panorama image of the ballpark loads fully
custom_expected:
THEN the image will be hoverable and the user will be able to see the 360-degree view of the ballpark

THEN the image will have balloons placed in its correct locations

title: Tapping On a Balloon
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the panorama image of the page fully loaded
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a balloon
custom_expected: THEN the panorama image will shift accordingly

title: Mini Map UX/UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to a team-specific page
custom_expected: THEN the minimap will be displayed and have its numbered balloons placed in the correct locations

title: Tapping On a Ballon
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the minimap of the page fully loaded
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a balloon
custom_expected: THEN the modal associated to it will be displayed

title: Ground Rule Particulars UX/UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to a team-specific page
custom_expected:
THEN the Ground Rule Particulars will be displayed and have its numbered balloons placed next to the correct rule associated with it

THEN the page will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing texts)

title: Tapping On a Ballon
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the panorama image of the page fully loaded
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a balloon
custom_expected: THEN the panorama image will shift accordingly
